埈字的基本解释

埈
jùn
古同“峻”。
古亭名，在今中国陕西省大荔县。

埈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jùn］
［《廣韻》私閏切，去稕，心。］
(1)同“陖”。
(2)古亭名。在今陕西省大荔县。

埈字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埈； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页229第25
【廣韻】【集韻】?同陖。

埈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
埈字的起名意思

古同“峻”，有峻雅，峻立之义，也用作古亭名。

埈
Basic explanation of words
埈
jùn
Gu Tong "jun".
The name of the ancient pavilion is in present-day Dali County, Shaanxi Province, China.
埈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jùn］
["Guangyun" privately cut, go to 稕, heart. ]
(1) Same as "陖".
(2) The name of the ancient pavilion. In today's Dali County, Shaanxi Province.

Old glyph
埈
Name meaning
The ancient same "jun" has the meaning of being elegant and standing, and it is also used as the name of the ancient pavilion.
jùn
high, steep, towering; stern
